name: BlockBox V1
description:
Save the civilians before time runs out.

A key - drop bomb or throw projectiles.
Space key - Use special
Arrows - move
F2 - reseta
F4 - hide the HUD

6 phases, 3 are secret.

There are six stages, but each can have 2 to 3 areas (including alternate paths).

Example:

If you are in phase 1-3, the two paths in this phase can lead you to phase 1-4A or 1-4B. But you will still be playing phase 1-4.

Tips:

-The coins serve to gain time (not points). Collect as many coins as possible and take them to a black block with a coin.
-Some blocks can only be destroyed with bombs or fire.
-After capturing the 4 civilians of each phase, take them to a block written "GOAL" (these blocks lead to some alternate paths).
